biography.title: Graduated from the Faculty of Management, Belarusian State Economic University
He started working on Belarusian television. He was the lead and director of the program «Filmed!»
In collaboration with Oleg Lukashevich, he implements the art project «Heritage of Belarus»
Defended a thesis of a candidate of economic sciences
Became the Laureate of the Prize of the President of the Republic of Belarus «For Spiritual Revival»
He became deputy head of the National Pavilion of the Republic of Belarus at the Cannes Film Festival
He began working in the Belarusian documentary as a director
He graduated from the Belarusian State Academy of Arts with a degree in director

mapPlace.title: London. Exhibition as part of the «Discover Belarus» campaign

snippet.shortDescription: Belarusian photographer, publisher, designer, journalist, director, candidate of economic sciences.

workList.title: Museum of Modern Art. Opening of the project with a series of photo exhibitions: «Temples of Belarus», «Manors and Town Halls of Belarus», «Palaces and Castles of Belarus»
UNESCO Headquarters in Paris. Exhibition «The Legacy of Belarus» in honor of the 50th anniversary of the entry of the Republic of Belarus into UNESCO
National Academy of St. Cecilia in Rome, exhibition in the framework of the Days of Culture of the Republic of Belarus
Pushkin House in London, an exhibition as part of the «Discover Belarus» campaign
At the art fence of the Chelyuskintsev open-air park in Minsk. Photo exhibition consisting of 60 photos
Book-album «National Historical Museum of the Republic of Belarus»
The art project «The Legacy of Belarus» presented in Brussels, Berlin, Minsk, Prague and Vienna
Art project «The Legacy of Belarus» presented in Budapest
